items.sentence: Do you want to know my first impression of Tom?
I want to buy a newspaper to read on the train.
I want to dedicate all my time to this project.
Tom almost forgot to take an umbrella with him.
Tom and I always speak to each other in French.
Tom and I have been friends since grade school.
Tom and Mary are fighting. Please do something.
Tom and Mary are sitting together on the couch.
Tom didn\'t understand anything we were saying.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to call him all the time.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to go to Boston with him.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to know what he had done.
Tom didn\'t want to give Mary his phone number.
Tom didn\'t want to go to the circus with Mary.
Tom said he doesn\'t know Mary\'s phone number.
Do you have any idea who might want to do that?
Do you have any special plans for the holidays?
Do you have something else more pressing to do?
Do you know if Tom has spoken to Mary recently?
She was very surprised when she heard the news.
Someone must have taken my umbrella by mistake.
Tom currently lives alone in a small apartment.
A gentleman would never do something like that.
The exact temperature is 22.68 degrees Celsius.
The ugly duckling turned into a beautiful swan.
Tom always dreamed of becoming a bounty hunter.
Tom decided to take matters into his own hands.
Tom said Mary didn\'t know how to speak French.
A girl named Mary said she was looking for you.
A man who knows two languages is worth two men.
A team is only as strong as its weakest member.
Tom spends about an hour a day studying French.
Tom stayed with me until the ambulance arrived.
Tom strung a clothesline between the two trees.
Be careful. I don\'t want you to hurt yourself.
Both Tom and I don\'t understand French at all.
Can you read what\'s written on the blackboard?
I can\'t imagine how I\'d feel in Tom\'s shoes.
They say that you never forget your first love.
I think you\'d look distinguished with a beard.
Maybe Tom was really as busy as he said he was.
Would somebody please tell me what\'s going on?
Tom works at a convenience store near my house.
Tom worries about the health of his loved ones.
Tom, who are you going to spend Christmas with?
Was it easy for you to find a job in Australia?
Was that the first time that you were arrested?
You should\'ve told me that you weren\'t happy.
Don\'t you think we should tell Tom about this?
Don\'t you wish you could go to Boston with us?
